title: After champ select game doesn't open
body: As the title says, after champ select, the game simply doesn't open.   The client works completely fine until this point.   As soon as the timer hits zero and the game is supposed to open all I get is the client with a reconnect button that does nothing when I click it.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a really hard time getting a connection with the game server you were supposed to play on. I would first try a hardwired connection if you can, but also look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if anything should be updated there.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ypke6cBq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-27T23:33:35.172+0000)

> It sounds like your network is having a really hard time getting a connection with the game server you were supposed to play on. I would first try a hardwired connection if you can, but also look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if anything should be updated there.

I'm already on a hardwire connection. I despise wifi because of how unstable it is.  I was trying to play a normal draft game before when this happened. I later tried an ARAM and it worked so I'm gonna try draft again and see if it happens.

Hmmmm that is a little odd that ARAM ran alright while draft doesn't. That almost makes me think that some of the files associated with Summoners Rift might be damaged, but I wouldn't want to steer you wrong. Let's get you some more in-depth help from our tech guys. Shoot them a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help as soon as they can!
